sentences: Jason Michael Wade (born July 5, 1980) is an American singer and songwriter best known as the lead vocalist and guitarist of the American alternative rock band Lifehouse.
Wade recorded a cover of "You Belong to Me" for the 2001 movie Shrek and its accompanying soundtrack.
Wade released a solo album entitled Paper Cuts in 2017.
His followup LP, Ode to Silence, was released December 31, 2021.
In 2018, Wade formed a band called Ã˜ZWALD with Lifehouse touring guitarist Steve Stout as a side project.
After the divorce, he and his mother moved to Seattle.
According to Wade, he used the Lifehouse song "You and Me" to propose to his then-girlfriend, Braeden, whom he married in 2001.
